database

Class DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseConnection

  • public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class representing the connection with the database. All traffic between the application and the database is conducted through the Connection object in this class.
    Author:
    Borko ArsoviÄ‡

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.Connection getConn()
      Returns the Connection object between the application and the database.
      static DatabaseConnection getInstance()
      Returns the only instance of the DatabaseConnection for this application.
      void setConn(java.sql.Connection conn)
      Sets the Connection object between the application and the database.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DatabaseConnection getInstance()
        Returns the only instance of the DatabaseConnection for this application. If there is no DatabaseConnection object, a new one will be created.
        Returns:
        DatabaseConnection

      • getConn

        public java.sql.Connection getConn()
        Returns the Connection object between the application and the database.
        Returns:
